option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. This sentence should start with the type of the changes (fix, feat, ...) with the domain into braces like "fix(domain): ..." or "fix(project:doamin): ..." for repo with many projects. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation.

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(hooks): add password support to use-preferences
Extended the Preferences type to include a password field. This change ensures the hook can manage password-related entries seamlessly.

task.summary: Default task

chore(idea): add IDE configuration files for project setup
Include JetBrains IDE-specific configuration files for project settings, code styles, inspections, version control, and workspace preferences. These files ensure consistent development environments and streamline workflows across team members. Also, update `.gitignore` to exclude unnecessary and temporary files.

feat(router): migrate to Expo Router and update dependencies
Replaced custom AppLayout with Expo Router's stack-based layout. Updated dependencies to include new packages required for the routing system. Adjusted scripts and project structure to align with the Expo Router setup.

feat(theme): implement dynamic theming with toggle support
Add a `ThemeProvider` for managing light and dark themes using `nativewind`. Introduce reusable `Button` and `Text` components, alongside a `ThemeToggle` for switching themes. Updated TailwindCSS configuration and project dependencies to support theming.

refactor(ui): restructure components and tweak theming
Refactored UI components, reorganizing button and text logic. Updated theme toggle and global styles to streamline theming consistency. Added support for Roboto and Rosarivo fonts with Expo configuration updates.

feat(app:tabs): implement new tab navigation and UI updates
Introduced a new tab-based navigation system with refactored layout, screens, and components. Updated theme colors, icons, and added a recipe list with a dynamic UI. Integrated new dependencies, including `expo-image` and `flash-list`, for enhanced UI performance.

feat(app:tabs): add recipe components and update tabs
Implemented `RecipeCard` and `RecipeList` components for recipe management. Refactored `index.tsx` and `search.tsx` to integrate these components with improved UI. Added a reusable `Input` component for the search functionality.

feat(app:ui): implement recipes and global tab components
Added new recipe navigation, custom components including Alert, Dialog, Tabs, Avatar, and Textarea. Organized app structure with revamped layouts, portals, and gesture handlers for better user experience. Introduced dependencies like `@rn-primitives` and `@shopify/flash-list` to enhance functionality.

feat(app:auth): add login and signup screens with UI components
Introduced new login and signup screens featuring reusable UI components like Checkbox, Input, and Button. Enhanced navigation structure and updated tab names for better readability. Added dependencies for checkbox functionality and adjusted default exports for consistency.

feat(app:recipes): enhance UI and add image picker functionality
Added font styling to Textarea and introduced an image picker for recipe creation using `expo-image-picker`. Updated `New` screen to include new input fields, image selection, and navigation logic. Updated dependencies in `package.json` to support the new features.

feat(app:build): integrate EAS configuration and dev client setup
Added `eas.json` for managing EAS builds with development, preview, and production profiles. Updated `package.json` to include `expo-dev-client` dependency and adjusted scripts for local development. This enhances build workflows and improves development flexibility.

feat(app:drawer): refactor navigation to drawer-based layout
Migrated app structure from tabs to a drawer-based navigation layout for better organization. Added custom hooks for preferences and contacts management, implemented enhanced notification handling, and updated various components and packages to support the new

feat(app:drawer): add swipe-to-delete functionality
Implement two new swipeable screens with delete functionality using `SlideToLeft`. Added animation handling with React Native Reanimated. Updated drawer layout and navigation structure to include the new screens.

feat(app:drawer): enhance UI and profile management
Updated contact item styles with rounded background and padding. Improved profile management with synchronized state handling and debouncing. These changes refine the UI/UX and enhance user interaction consistency.

feat(app:drawer): integrate swipeable item for list actions
Replaced custom swipe-to-delete implementation with `react-native-swipeable-item`. Improved list rendering efficiency and modularized UI with better swipeable item handling. Updated dependencies to include swipeable item support.

feat(components:bottom-sheet): integrate reusable bottom sheet
Added a reusable `BottomSheet` component using `@gorhom/bottom-sheet` to enhance UI/UX for modal interactions. Updated `RecipeCard` to incorporate long-press to show recipe details via the bottom sheet. Wrapped the app's layout with `BottomSheetModalProvider` and updated dependencies in the project.

feat(components:bottom-sheet): integrate reusable bottom sheet
Added a reusable `BottomSheet` component using `@gorhom/bottom-sheet` to enhance UI/UX for modal interactions. Updated `RecipeCard` to incorporate long-press to show recipe details via the bottom sheet. Wrapped the app's layout with `BottomSheetModalProvider` and updated dependencies in the project.

feat(app:contacts): enhance contact item with bottom sheet
Integrated a reusable bottom sheet for contact details display. Added support for long-press to show contact details and improved call handling logic. Updated the contacts hook to fetch additional contact fields like birthday and job title.

feat(app:drawer): improve swipeable list with trash icon
Replaced placeholder data with static dataset and updated list styling. Enhanced swipeable actions by adding Trash icon for delete functionality. Refactored underlays and separators for better modularity and UI consistency.

feat(db): add database schema for recipes application
Introduce SQLite schema defining tables for recipes, ingredients, steps, and comments. This lays the foundation for managing recipe-related data in a structured manner.

feat(project:drizzle): implement SQLite database schema and migrations
Added initial SQLite schema with recipes, ingredients, steps, and comments, along with relations. Integrated database migrations and updated the recipe components to use dynamic data from the SQLite database. Also configured Drizzle and related dependencies for migration/ORM support.

feat(recipes): enhance recipe editing and database schema
Added editing capabilities for recipes, ingredients, and steps, including a publish feature. Updated SQLite schemas to include a new `published` column in the `recipes` table and adjusted default timestamps.

feat(recipes): enhance recipe editing and data handling
Added swipe-to-delete functionality for recipe ingredients and steps with animations using Reanimated. Improved LiveQuery dependencies for reactivity and ensured consistency in type inference for database schema. Refactored components for better modularity and UI updates.

feat(map): add geofencing with map and location tracking
Introduce a map view with geofencing capabilities using Google Maps. Implement region-based alerts and notifications for entering/exiting predefined areas. Added a custom hook for handling user location and permissions.

feat(drawer): add Map screen and update drawer navigation
Introduced a new "Map" screen with its corresponding icon and drawer label. Updated the drawer navigation to include configuration for the Map screen. Adjusted .gitignore to include .env.* files and fixed newline handling.

feat(project:dependencies): add new packages for geofencing and mapping
Added `@rn-bridge/react-native-geofencing`, `react-native-maps`, and several `expo` utilities for new features. These enhancements support geofencing, mapping, and sensor functionalities, boosting the app's capability for location-based and interactive features.

feat(app:permissions): add location, motion, and audio support
Integrated permissions for location, motion, and microphone access, and added support for Google Maps via API key. Updated the home screen with API call functionality to fetch data. Exported the map icon component for use in the UI.

feat(app:sensors): introduce pedometer screen and utilities
Added a new Sensors screen with a Pedometer feature for step tracking, distance, and speed calculations. Implemented a custom `usePedometer` hook for managing pedometer data and permissions. Updated drawer navigation to include the new Sensors section.

feat(sensors): add shake detection with notification support
Introduced a new screen for detecting device shakes using the accelerometer. It sends a notification when a shake is detected and adds a corresponding link in the sensors index for navigation.

feat(components): add ListBlock component
Introduce a reusable ListBlock component for displaying a title and an optional

feat(components:icons): add GaugeIcon component
Introduced GaugeIcon component using lucide-react-native. Utilized iconWithClassName utility for consistent styling and export.

feat(app:sensors): add gyroscope sensor screen
Introduced a new screen to display gyroscope sensor data. It retrieves real-time x, y, and z-axis values and visualizes them with animated rotation. Includes a back navigation button for user convenience.

feat(app:sensors): add light sensor screen
Introduce a new screen to display light sensor data using Expo Sensors. Includes functionality to subscribe and unsubscribe to sensor updates and displays availability and illuminance details. The feature is primarily supported on Android devices.

feat(app:sensors): enhance sensors UI and functionality
Added support for "expo-brightness" plugin and updated sensor navigation icons. Improved Sensors layout with hidden stack headers and updated UI to use buttons with SafeView for better design consistency. Introduced new links for additional sensor features.

feat(app:sensors): enhance pedometer and add shake detection
Updated the Pedometer screen with a revamped layout and `ListBlock` components for improved readability. Adjusted speed calculation logic in the `usePedometer` hook for accuracy. Introduced a new "Shake Detection" screen with notifications support and navigation enhancements.

fix(hooks:use-pedometer): correct speed calculation logic
Updated the speed calculation to fix improper logic by replacing a redundant factor with a randomized value. This ensures a more realistic and varied speed computation.

fix(map): adjust date handling in API request
Updated the date logic to set a 2-hour offset before sending it in the API request. This ensures accurate time representation for the backend.

feat(app:sensors): enhance light and gyroscope sensor screens
Renamed the Light sensor screen for consistency and improved its functionality with animations and UI updates. Adjusted gyroscope screen styles and text for better clarity and presentation. Minor improvements include seeking notifications permission on startup and removing redundant console logs.

feat(hooks): add password support to use-preferences
Extended the Preferences type to include a password field. This change ensures the hook can manage password-related entries seamlessly.

feat(components): add ListBlock component
Introduce a reusable ListBlock component for displaying value in a styled row. This enhances the UI consistency and modularity across the app.

feat(components:icons): add GaugeIcon component
Introduced GaugeIcon component using lucide-react-native. Utilized iconWithClassName utility for consistent styling and export.

Added support for "expo-brightness" plugin and updated sensor navigation icons. Improved Sensors layout with hidden stack headers and updated UI to use buttons with SafeView for better design consistency. Introduced new links for additional sensor features.

Updated the Pedometer screen with a revamped layout and `ListBlock` components for improved readability. Adjusted speed calculation logic in the `usePedometer` hook for accuracy. Introduced a new "Shake Detection" screen with notifications support and navigation enhancements.

fix(hooks:use-pedometer): correct speed calculation logic
Updated the speed calculation to fix improper logic by replacing a redundant factor with a randomized value. This ensures a more realistic and varied speed computation.

Updated the date logic to set a 2-hour offset before sending it in the API request. This ensures accurate time representation for the backend.

Renamed the Light sensor screen for consistency and improved its functionality with animations and UI updates. Adjusted gyroscope screen styles and text for better clarity and presentation. Minor improvements include seeking notifications permission on startup and removing redundant console logs.
